definition: friendly neighboring countries/to keep up good relations with neighboring countries

sentences.english: Good-neighborliness and Friendliness Policy is a basic policy of the country in our foreign affairs.
sentences.chinese: 睦邻友好政策是我国外交工作中一项基本国策。

sentences.english: Visible results have been achieved in China-Malaysia good-neighborly cooperation of friendship.
sentences.chinese: 中马睦邻友好合作已经取得了实实在在的成果。

sentences.english: First, mutual respect is the political foundation of good-neighborly friendship.
sentences.chinese: 一是把相互尊重作为睦邻友好的政治基础。

sentences.english: The visit is aimed to further strengthen the traditional good-neighborly relations.
sentences.chinese: 访问的目的是进一步加强两国传统的睦邻友好关系。

sentences.english: First, enhancing friendship and political trust and good- neighborliness.
sentences.chinese: 第一，增进睦邻友好和政治互信。

sentences.english: We lay special stress on developing good-neighbourly relations with nearby countries.
sentences.chinese: 我们特别重视发展同邻近国家的睦邻关系。

sentences.english: Good-neighbor policy is one of the important parts of Zhou Enlai foreign thoughts.
sentences.chinese: 睦邻外交是周恩来外交思想的重要组成部分。

sentences.english: China and Kyrgyzstan boast a solid foundation for their good-neighborly relations of friendship and cooperation.
sentences.chinese: 中吉睦邻友好合作关系的基础十分牢固。

sentences.english: Roh Moo-hyun made highly positive comments on China's foreign policy of equality, mutual benefits and good-neighborliness towards neighboring countries.
sentences.chinese: 卢武铉高度评价中国平等互利的睦邻周边外交政策。

sentences.english: Second, peace and tranquility are important guarantee of good-neighborly friendship.
sentences.chinese: 二是把和平安宁作为睦邻友好的重要保障。

sentences.english: He pointed out that the Palestinian-Israeli peace talks should be to achieve the ultimate goal of good neighborliness and friendship.
sentences.chinese: 他指出，巴以和谈应该以达成睦邻友好为最终目的。

sentences.english: You are close neighbours in health, and you are good neighbours.
sentences.chinese: 你们在卫生方面是近邻，而且是睦邻。

sentences.english: Enkhbayar indicated that bilateral partnership of good-neighborliness and mutual trust has been developing smoothly.
sentences.chinese: 恩赫巴亚尔表示，蒙中睦邻互信伙伴关系发展顺利。

definition: friendly/amicable/to keep up harmonious relations (with sb)
to keep watch and defend one another (idiom, from Mencius); to join forces to defend against external aggressors/mutual help and protection
Huzhu Tuzu autonomous county in Haidong prefecture 海東地區|海东地区[Hai3 dong1 di4 qu1], Qinghai
to be both a farmer and a scholar/to work the land and also undertake academic studies
to yield to one another/mutual accommodation
